goals__remit:
EUMAP Consulting is an independent public affairs agency with special policy expertise on Environment, Industry, Climate Change, Employment, Humanitarian, Cultural and Religious issues. EUMAP provides tailored, integrated services across the spectrum of public affairs, which include strategic advice, design and implementation, communications, monitoring, policy analysis, events management, media relations, and coalition building. We cover a broad range of EU initiatives and issues. 
EU MAP Consulting ensures its clients are able to navigate the complex political processes and build strategic relationships in order to reach the right people at the right time and deliver correct and credible information.
customers: International Zinc Association Europe# Nickel Institute
